pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"如需克隆 Linux 代码，使用"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git clone {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"若要将 mirror 加入已有代码库，可在已有仓库中运行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git remote add mirror {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"或运行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git remote set-url origin {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"将默认上游设置为镜像站"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"增量下载","children":"增量下载"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果需要其它 linux 分支的代码（如树莓派内核代码），可以在 clone 本项目基础上增量下载分支的代码，从而加速下载"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"以树莓派为例，具体操作为"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git clone {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}
git remote add rasp https://github.com/raspberrypi/linux.git
git fetch rasp","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: Linux Git 镜像使用帮助
